p: High content of nutrition in pods and seeds of M. oleifera have been reported in many studies. There is about 9.98–51.80 g crude protein, 17.26–20.00 g crude fiber, 3.36–18.00 g carbohydrate, 38.67–43.60 g fat, and 3.60–5.00 g ash per 100 g M. oleifera seeds [ 34]. Pods contain abundance of dietary fiber, low content of lipid, and a reasonable amount of unsaturated and essential fatty acids, especially oleic acid [ 35].
